Text: Qari Saifullah Akhtar:  When HUJI merged with Harkat-ul-Mujahideen (HUM) around 1990 to form Harkat-ul-Ansar (HUA), Akhtar acted as deputy to former HUM leader and then amir Maulana Fazalur Rehman Khalil.
Triplets:<Qari Saifullah Akhtar
6:
Text: Qari Saifullah Akhtar:  HUA dissolved back into two separate groups in 1997, allowing Akhtar to become amir of HUJI.
Triplets:<Qari Saifullah Akhtar
